message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, considering the inflation disadvantage I'll face in the next round.
I propose a 50/50 split. Considering the inflation, this seems like a fair compromise.

While I understand your desire for a 50/50 split, the inflation significantly impacts my share. Let's find a compromise closer to my initial offer, I propose 60/40. This will help mitigate the inflation's impact on my share.
